trans-unit.source: Acts as a container to a group of activities that is executed when the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> starts running.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />가 실행되기 시작하면 실행되는 활동 그룹의 컨테이너 역할을 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> acts as a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> to all activities it contains.
<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> classes may be included in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>.

If a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> exists in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is the first activity that gets executed when the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> starts executing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>가 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>에 있는 경우 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>가 실행되기 시작하면 실행되는 첫 번째 활동입니다.

trans-unit.source: In some ways the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is like an `OnEnterState` handler.
The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is not a mandatory activity in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>.

The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>입니다. 즉, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>는 다른 활동을 포함할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> cannot contain any activity that implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> interface, which includes all <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> activities and the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>는 모든 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> 활동과 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> 활동을 포함하는<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> 인터페이스를 구현하는 어떠한 활동도 포함할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is executed in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, a non-blocking manner that makes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> ready to receive events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>가 이벤트를 받을 준비를 하도록 비블로킹 방식으로 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>에서 실행됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> can contain a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> activity, so that it can model a state machine where transitions occur from state to state without receiving any event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> 활동을 포함할 수 있으므로 이벤트를 수신하지 않고 상태를 전환하는 상태 시스템을 모델링할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: In that sense the state machine behaves like a sequential workflow.
trans-unit.target: 이 경우 상태 시스템은 순차 워크플로처럼 동작합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity" /> class.
The following example shows how to create a new instance of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> object.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> 개체의 새 인스턴스를 만드는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the State Initialization SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: 이 예제는 State Initialization SDK 샘플에 포함되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 활동 이름을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.
